TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Installer extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: Provides the foundation for custom installations.

span.span: Provides the foundation for custom installations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是.NET Framework 中的所有自定义安装程序类的基类。This is the base class for all custom installers in the .NET Framework. 安装程序帮助的计算机上安装应用程序的组件。Installers are components that help install applications on a computer. 有几个步骤必须遵循使用:There are several steps you must follow to use an : - 继承类。Inherit the class. - 重写， ， ，和方法。Override the , , , and methods. - 添加到派生类，并将其设置为`true`。Add the to your derived class and set it to `true`. - 将你的派生的类放在与你的应用程序安装的程序集。Put your derived class in the assembly with your application to install. - 调用安装程序。Invoke the installers. 例如，使用 InstallUtil.exe 来调用安装程序。For example, use the InstallUtil.exe to invoke the installers. 属性包含的安装程序集合。The property contains a collection of installers. 如果此实例的是安装程序集合的一部分属性设置为实例，它包含集合。If this instance of is part of an installer collection, the property is set to the instance that contains the collection. 有关用法的示例集合，请参阅类。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. ， ， ，和方法类完成的安装程序存储在集合属性，并调用每个安装程序的相应方法。The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers stored in the property, and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. ， ， ，和方法不会在同一个始终调用实例。The , , , and methods are not always called on the same instance. 例如，一个可能同时安装和提交应用程序中，使用实例，之后发布到该实例的引用。For example, one instance might be used while installing and committing an application, and then the reference to that instance is released. 更高版本，卸载应用程序时将创建一个新的引用实例，意味着的另一个实例调用方法。Later, uninstalling the application creates a reference to a new instance, meaning that the method is called by a different instance of . 出于此原因，在派生类中，不保存安装程序中的计算机的状态。For this reason, in your derived class, do not save the state of a computer in an installer. 请改用，它是在调用之间保留并传递到您， ， ，和方法。Instead, use an that is preserved across calls and passed into your , , , and methods. 两种情况下说明需要将信息保存在状态保护程序。Two situations illustrate the need to save information in the state-saver . 首先，假设您的安装程序设置一个注册表项。First, suppose that your installer sets a registry key. 它应保存的密钥中的原始值。It should save the key's original value in the . 如果安装回滚后，可以还原原始值。If the installation is rolled back, the original value can be restored. 其次，假设安装程序将替换现有文件。Second, suppose the installer replaces an existing file. 将现有的文件保存在临时目录和文件中的新位置的位置中。Save the existing file in a temporary directory and the location of the new location of the file in the . 如果回滚安装，较新的文件被删除并替换为从临时位置的原始。If the installation is rolled back, the newer file is deleted and replaced by the original from the temporary location. 属性包含有关安装的信息。The property contains information about the installation. 例如，安装过程中，要保存所需的信息的文件的位置的日志文件的位置有关的信息方法，以及运行可执行安装时已输入的命令行。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将类。The following example demonstrates the use of the class. 它将创建一个类，该类继承自。It creates a class which inherits from . 当即将完成，事件发生并显示一条消息。When is about to complete, event occurs and a message is displayed. 若要使用类，必须引用**System.Configuration.Install**在项目中的程序集。To use the class, you must reference the **System.Configuration.Install** assembly in your project. [!code-cpp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CPP/installer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CS/installer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/VB/installer.vb#1)]

span.para: 如果重写方法在派生类中，请务必调用基类的首先中派生方法的方法。仅当调用方法方法的此实例中每个安装程序成功。方法将进行正确卸载，并调用所需的信息存储集合中每个安装程序的方法。

If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. The method is called only if the method of each installer in this instance's succeeds. The method stores information needed to do a correct uninstallation, and calls the method of each installer in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含安装信息。The property contains installation information. 例如，安装过程中，要保存所需的信息的文件的位置的日志文件的位置有关的信息方法，以及运行可执行安装时已输入的命令行。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 调用程序， ， ，或方法集方法所需的信息的属性。The program that calls the , , , or methods sets the property with information that the methods need. 如果安装程序属于安装程序集合，父安装程序将设置之前调用这些方法的任何属性。If an installer belongs to an installer collection, the parent installer sets the property before calling any of these methods. 可以通过访问父 installer属性。The parent installer can be accessed through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性的类。The following example demonstrates the property of the class. 内容属性包含的安装过程中，要保存所需的信息的文件的位置的日志文件位置信息方法，并已在命令行输入时安装运行可执行文件。The contents of the property contain information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 这些内容将显示在控制台上。These contents are then displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CPP/installer_context.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CS/installer_context.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/VB/installer_context.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.

span.span: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.

value.span: 安装程序集合中所有安装程序的帮助文本，包括安装程序的用途说明以及可执行安装文件（如 InstallUtil.exe 实用工具）的命令行选项，这些选项可以传递给该安装程序并为其所识别。

span.span: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what the installer does and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the InstallUtil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by this installer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此属性中定义类，调用时，返回的说明和可执行文件，如 Installutil.exe 实用工具，可以传递给和理解的安装命令行选项.This property is defined in the class, which, when called, returns the description of the and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the Installutil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by the . span.para: -如果您重写方法在派生类中，请务必调用基类的首先中派生方法的方法。方法调用方法中包含每个安装程序的此实例的属性。包含的安装程序运行后，此方法会更新对象 (通过指定参数) 以反映安装的状态。应为空时传递给方法。如果所有方法成功，调用方法。否则为调用方法。 -如果你需要安装程序将实例添加到中的集合方法，请务必执行上述相同的元素添加到集合中方法。但是，您可以避免维护这两种方法中的集合，如果您安装程序将实例添加到类构造函数中的自定义安装程序的集合。

- If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance. After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation. The should be empty when passed to the method. If all the methods succeed, the method is called. Otherwise, the method is called. - If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法之后调用方法的此实例中的所有安装程序运行。This method is called after the methods of all the installers in this instance's run. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法允许派生的类进行处理的事件，而无需附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 在派生类中重写此方法。This method is overridden in the derived class. 提供空间以添加步骤以完成安装后方法。Space is provided to add steps to be done after the installation in the method. [!code-cpp[Installer_OnInstall#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_OnInstall/CPP/installer_oninstall.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Installer_OnInstall#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_OnInstall/CS/installer_oninstall.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Installer_OnInstall#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_OnInstall/VB/installer_oninstall.vb#2)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法之后调用方法的此实例中的所有安装程序已运行。This method is called after the methods of all the installers in this instance's have run. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法允许派生的类进行处理的事件，而无需附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

[!code-cpp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CPP/installer_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CS/installer_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/VB/installer_rollback.vb#1)]

span.para: 当您重写方法在派生类中，请务必调用基类的首先中派生方法的方法。回滚操作将计算机还原为安装发生之前的状态。仅当调用方法方法的此实例的，否则安装程序集合中的任何安装程序无法正确运行。通过调用生成的任何异常方法的安装程序集合中的安装程序将被忽略并且的其他安装程序回滚继续进行。

When you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. A rollback operation restores the computer to the state it was in before the installations occurred. The method is called if the method of this instance of , or any installer in the installer collection, fail to run correctly. Any exceptions generated by calling the methods of the installers in the installer collection are ignored and the rollback of the other installers continues.

span.para: -如果您重写方法在派生类中，请务必调用基类的首先中派生方法的方法。方法调用方法中包含每个安装程序的此实例的属性。包含的安装程序运行后，此方法会更新对象 (通过指定参数) 以反映安装的状态。应为空时传递给方法。如果所有方法成功，调用方法。否则为调用方法。 -如果你需要安装程序将实例添加到中的集合方法，请务必执行上述相同的元素添加到集合中方法。但是，您可以避免维护这两种方法中的集合，如果您安装程序将实例添加到类构造函数中的自定义安装程序的集合。

- If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method. The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance. After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation. The should be empty when passed to the method. If all the methods succeed, the method is called. Otherwise, the method is called. - If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.
